docs.snippet: The Senate was in Committee of the Whole last evening--holding a short session, and passing nothing of general interest.  The House was also in Committee of the Whole, having the Anuual Appropriation under process of incubation. Several amendments...

headline.main: NOTES FROM THE CAPITAL.; THE APPROPRIATION BILLS--THE POLICE BILL-- THE CHARTER--THE SANITARY BILL--THE ALMSHOUSE DEPARTMENT--THE TOLL BILL-- SICKNESS OF SENATOR WILLIAMS--SUPERINTENDENT OF PUBLIC INSTRUCTION.

docs.lead_paragraph: The Senate was in Committee of the Whole last evening--holding a short session, and passing nothing of general interest. The House was also in Committee of the Whole, having the Anuual Appropriation under process of incubation. Several amendments important to various, charitable institutions in and about New-York were adopted.

docs.snippet: It is now nearly three weeks since I left Kanagawa, for the purpose of delivering to our Minister Resident at Yedo some papers placed in my hands on the eve of my departure from the United States.

headline.main: AFFAIRS IN JAPAN.; Visit, to the United States Legation--Illness of Mr. Harris--Action of the Government-- Financial and Miscellaneous Matters.

docs.lead_paragraph: It is now nearly three weeks since I left Kanagawa, for the purpose of delivering to our Minister Resident at Yedo some papers placed in my hands on the eve of my departure from the United States.

headline.main: From the Bahamas.; COMPLIMENTARY ENTERTAINMENT TO EX-PRESIDENT PIERCE--THE PINE-APPLE CROP.
Testimony of Experts.; THE PAYMENT OF SCIENTIFIC MEN SUMMONED AS WITNESSES.

docs.snippet: The Canada arrived at Halifax yesterday, with three days' later news from Europe. In the English House of Commons the consideration of the motion protesting against the annexation of Savoy to France had been postponed, on the ground that discussion...
docs.lead_paragraph: The Canada arrived at Halifax yesterday, with three days' later news from Europe. In the English House of Commons the consideration of the motion protesting against the annexation of Savoy to France had been postponed, on the ground that discussion at present would be prejudicial to the public service.

docs.snippet: The theatres this week have been more remarkable for consistency than success. They have ad  hered to their programmes, and braved alike the weather and public indifference. At Wallack's Theatre, the "Romance of a Poor Young Man" has drawn the best...
docs.lead_paragraph: The theatres this week have been more remarkable for consistency than success. They have ad hered to their programmes, and braved alike the weather and public indifference. At Wallack's Theatre, the "Romance of a Poor Young Man" has drawn the best houses. People who saw it on its production begin to take a fresh interest in its continued success, and desire to see it again.

docs.snippet: The principal event of the past month has been the arrival at this port of His Royal Highness the Archduke MAXIMILIAN, of Austria. His Highness arrived about two weeks since, from Madeira, via Bahia and the Ambrolios, in the corvette Elizabeth. He is...

headline.main: FROM RIO JANEIRIO.; Visit of the Archduke Maximilian--Fever at Bahia--American Naval Vessels--Miscellaneous Intelligence.

docs.lead_paragraph: The principal event of the past month has been the arrival at this port of His Royal Highness the Archduke MAXIMILIAN, of Austria. His Highness arrived about two weeks since, from Madeira, via Bahia and the Ambrolios, in the corvette Elizabeth. He is traveling strictly incognito, and avoids everything in the way of display or public honor.
